scenes.action_text: ARCTIC BLUE by Ross LaManna FADE IN: 1 EXT. BOREAL FOREST - ALASKA - (AERIAL SHOT) - DAY Flying. Not at the intangible height of a jet, but at spitting distance from the treetops. We're in central Alaska, the Big Lonely, just north of the Arctic Circle. A thick forest follows the contours of mountain foothills like a deep-pile carpet. Up at treeline the forest thins to tundra, a grassy scruff turning red and yellow with the coming of autumn. On the horizon, the hills rise to
